title: Foot Locker Shares Tumble Amid Weak Sales Forecast, Pledge to Cut Nike Purchases
sub_head: Footwear and apparel seller cites efforts to overhaul business, waning boost from government stimulus
body:
For Foot Locker Inc., kicking the Nike habit is hard.
Shares of the New York City-based footwear and apparel retailer tumbled more than 30% Friday after the company said it expects weaker sales and profits this year due to the current economic environment and its efforts to overhaul its business.
